discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The Assets sheet has a Asset of text type by the GetAsset activity. Credentials cannot be obtained with this activity, so specify the asset name in the Settings sheet and obtain it separately with GetCredentials.

Selected Answer: C
Credentials should be added in the "Settings Sheet"

Selected Answer: D
There are four types of assets:

Text - stores only strings (it is not required to add quotation marks)
Bool - supports true or false values
Integer - stores only whole numbers
Credential - contains usernames and passwords that the Robot requires to execute particular processes.

https://docs.uipath.com/orchestrator/standalone/2023.4/user-guide/about-assets

comments.content: C is the correct answer because you need to put credential asset in settings sheet

questions.question_text: What distinguishes the Settings sheet from the Assets sheet in the “Config.xisx’ file?

choices.B: Settings sheet contains only values used for the initialization of applications. Assets sheet contains only Credential Assets stored in Orchestrator
choices.D: Settings sheet contains hard-coded values. Assets sheet contains all names of Orchestrator Assets including those of type Credential
choices.A: Settings sheet contains Credential Assets stored in Orchestrator. Assets sheet contains hard-coded values.
choices.C: Settings sheet contains hard-coded values. Assets sheet contains all names of Orchestrator Assets except those of type Credential

questions.question_text: A developer defines new log fields using the Add Log Fields activity. When will the custom log fields stop being added to the robot execution logs?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B.

choices.C: When a Log Message activity is executed with Log Level = Warm or higher.
choices.D: When the first Log Message activity is executed.
choices.A: When an Exception is caught and handled.
choices.B: When a Remove Log Fields activity is used to remove them.

questions.question_text: The Extract PDF Page Range activity is used to extract a specific set of pages from a PDF file. Which of the following statements correctly describes this activity?

choices.B:
Copy text using the Get Text activity.
Hover over an element using the Hover activity.
Highlight an element using the Highlight activity.
choices.C:
Copy text using the Get Text activity.
Hover over an element using the Hover activity.
Click on buttons, links, and other clickable elements such as icons or images.
Type text in a text area such as a text box.
Select or clear a check box.
choices.A:
Select or clear a check box.
Send keyboard shortcuts using your keyboard.
Select an item from a drop-down.
choices.D:
Click on buttons, links, and other clickable elements such as icons or images.
Type text in a text area such as a text box
Select or clear a check box.
Send keyboard shortcuts using your keyboard.
Select an item from a drop-down.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B.
